verses.roman:
svayaṁ bhagavān kṛṣṇa, kṛṣṇa sarvāśraya
parama īśvara kṛṣṇa sarva-śāstre kaya

synonyms: svayam—Himself; bhagavān—the Supreme Personality of Godhead; kṛṣṇa—Lord Kṛṣṇa; kṛṣṇa—Lord Kṛṣṇa; sarva-āśraya—the shelter of all; parama—Supreme; īśvara—Lord; kṛṣṇa—Lord Kṛṣṇa; sarva-śāstre—all scriptures; kaya—say.
translation: "Thus the Personality of Godhead Śrī Kṛṣṇa is the original primeval Lord, the source of all other expansions. All the revealed scriptures accept Śrī Kṛṣṇa as the Supreme Lord.
